Package hxasjc.utilstuff.ansi

Class AnsiText

java.lang.Object
hxasjc.utilstuff.ansi.AnsiText
All Implemented Interfaces:
ANSI
public class AnsiText extends Object implements ANSI
Stores text formatting ANSI escape sequences
